about.about_aleksis_1: This platform is powered by AlekSIS®, a web-based school information system (SIS) which can be used to manage and/or publish organisational artifacts of educational institutions. AlekSIS is free software and can be used by anyone.
about.about_aleksis_2: AlekSIS® is a registered trademark of the AlekSIS open source project, represented by Teckids e.V.
about.licence_information_1: The core and the official apps of AlekSIS are licenced under the EUPL, version 1.2 or later. For licence information from third-party apps, if installed, refer to the respective components below. The licences are marked like this:

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: The link is valid. Please enter a new password:
reset_password.message: Forgotten your password? Enter your e-mail address below, and we'll send you an e-mail allowing you to reset it.
reset_password.contact_admins: Please contact one of your site administrators, if you have any trouble resetting your password:

done.title: Password reset link sent
done.message: We have sent you an e-mail if an account with this email exists. Please contact one of your site administrators if you do not receive it within a few minutes. You can close this tab now.

reset_password.invalid_key: The password reset key is invalid. This may be because it has already been used or has expired.

confirm.title: Send password reset e-mail?
confirm.message: The user will receive a link to reset their password. They can still login with their current password until it is changed.

submitted.title: Registration successful!
submitted.submitted_successfully: Your account has been successfully registered. You can log in with your credentials now.

form.existing_account_alert: Already have an account? Then please log in.

invitation.title: Invitation code
invitation.not_valid: The invitation code you entered is not valid.
invitation.autofilled: The invitation code was automatically filled in.

invitation_code.label: Invitation code
invitation_code.help_text: If you have an invitation code, please enter it.

privacy_policy.label: I have read and agree to the {url}.

confirm.title: Confirm account registration
confirm.invitation_used: Some personal data will be taken over from the data associated with the invitation you accepted.

confirm_email.no_match: The e-mail addresses do not match

totp.title: Authenticator App
totp.description: You generate one-time codes using an authenticator app.

activate.title: Activate Authenticator App
activate.description:
To protect your account with two-factor authentication, scan the QR code below with your
          authenticator app. Then, input the verification code generated by the app below.

recovery_codes.title: Recovery Codes
recovery_codes.count: No recovery codes remaining|One recovery code remaining|{count} recovery codes remaining
recovery_codes.description: If you can't use any of your devices, you can access your account using recovery codes.
recovery_codes.dialog_description: The following recovery codes are unused. Please keep them at a safe place. You can use them if none of your other devices is working.
recovery_codes.generate_question: You are about to generate a new set of recovery codes for your account. This action will invalidate any existing codes. Are you sure?

webauthn.title: Security Keys
webauthn.dialog_name_description: Please give your new security key a name.
webauthn.description: You use a security key (either as external device or integrated in your personal device).
webauthn.count: No security keys|One security key|{count} security keys

deactivate.title: Deactivate Two Factor Authentication Method
deactivate.description: Are you sure that you want to deactivate this two factor authentication method? This will reduce the security of your account.

actions.confirm_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
actions.confirm_deletion_multiple: Are you sure you want to delete these items?
actions.title: Actions

enabled.title: Maintenance mode enabled
enabled.subtitle: Only admin and visitors from internal IPs can access the site.

enabled.title: Debug mode enabled
enabled.subtitle: The web server throws back debug information on errors. Do not use in production!

disabled.title: Debug mode disabled
disabled.subtitle: Debug mode is disabled. Default error pages are displayed on errors.

registered_checks.title: Registered checks
registered_checks.help_text: The system will check for the following problems:

problems_detected.title: The system detected some problems with your data.
problems_detected.text: Please go through all data and check whether some extra action is needed.

no_problems_detected.title: Everything is fine.
no_problems_detected.text: The system hasn't detected any problems with your data.

alerts.page_cached: This page may contain outdated information since there is no internet connection.

announcement.title: Title
announcement.title_hint: Title is always shown, e.g. in the banner
announcement.description_hint: Description is shown in details, e.g. after clicking on the banner
announcement.priority_hint: Optional, announcements with higher priorities are shown first
announcement.is_global_hint: If the announcement is global, it will be shown to all persons independent of the selected recipients. The information about recipients still might be used in other apps.
announcement.explanation: Announcements are important messages for certain persons, groups, or everyone valid for a time period. During this period, they are shown as banner below the app bar as well in the announcement calendar. Additionally, the affected persons are notified about the announcement.
announcement.notifications_hint: This will send notifications to the selected recipients at {when}.
announcement.notifications_global_hint: This will send notifications to all persons at {when}.

base.about_aleksis: About AlekSIS® — The Free School Information System
base.no_permission_message_long: You have no permission to view this page. Please login with an other account.
base.no_permission_message_long_not_logged_in: You have no permission to view this page. Please login with your account.
base.person_is_dummy: Your administrator account is not linked to any person. Therefore, a dummy person has been linked to your account.
base.user_not_linked_to_person: Your user account is not linked to a person. This means you cannot access any school-related information. Please contact the managers of AlekSIS at your school.

calendar.ics_to_clipboard: Copy link to calendar ICS to clipboard

no_calendar_event_card.title: No events selected
no_calendar_event_card.description: Select some events to show them here

celery_progress.error_message: The operation couldn't be finished successfully.
celery_progress.success_message: The operation has been finished successfully.

status.OFF_helper: To activate this widget, complete its configuration

fields.allowed_calendars_hint: If no specific calendars are selected, all calendars are allowed.
fields.selected_calendars_hint: If no specific calendars are selected, all calendars are displayed.

dashboard.manage_dashboard_hint: Customize your dashboard by dragging and dropping the widgets.
dashboard.manage_default_dashboard_hint: Customize the default dashboard by dragging and dropping the widgets.
dashboard.customizing_notice: You didn't customise your dashboard so that you see the system default. Please click on "Edit dashboard" to customise your personal dashboard.

download_pdf.notice: If the download does not start automatically, please click the button below.
download_pdf.title: Downloading PDF file ...

graphql.snackbar_error_message: There was an error retrieving the page data. Please try again.
graphql.snackbar_success_message: The operation has been finished successfully.

group.name: Name

group.parent_groups_n: No Parent Groups | {n} Parent Group | {n} Parent Groups
group.member_of_n: Not member in any group | Member of {n} group | Member of {n} groups
group.owner_of_n: Not owner of any group | Owner of {n} group | Owner of {n} groups
group.confirm_delete: Do you really want to delete this group?

group_type.title: Group Type
group_type.name: Name
group_type.owners_can_see_groups: Owners of groups with this group type can see the groups
group_type.owners_can_see_members: Owners of groups with this group type can see group members
group_type.owners_can_see_members_allowed_informati: Information owners of groups with this group type can see of the group's members

legacy.unworthy: The life-form who created this view did not bow to the powers of the almighty Aleksolotl.

network_errors.offline_notification: You are offline. Some features may not work and some data may not be up to date.
network_errors.page_not_found: The requested page or resource could not be found.
network_errors.snackbar_error_message: A network error occurred. Please try again.
network_errors.service_unavailable: The server is under maintenance and therefore temporarily unavailable.

browser_errors.browsers_compatibility: AlekSIS is not compatible with this browser and version. Please use a recent version of Firefox (recommended) or another commonly used browser.

o_auth_application.title: OAuth Application
o_auth_application.name: Name
o_auth_application.client_secret_hint: Hashed on save. Copy it now if this is a new secret.
o_auth_application.credentials_warning: Please carefully note down these credentials. You won't get a second chance to see them.

authorized_application.description: The following third-party applications have access to your account. You can revoke access at any time for those you don't need or trust anymore.
authorized_application.revoke_question: Are you sure you want to revoke access for this application?

authorized_application.title: Third-party Applications

person.confirm_delete: Do you really want to delete this person?
person.name: Name
person.no_additional_image: The person didn't upload an additional Image
person.title: Person

active_school_term.title: Active School Term
active_school_term.subtitle: This selection affects all pages in AlekSIS.
active_school_term.warning: Warning: You are currently viewing data from a different school term ({termName}). Information may be outdated and may not reflect the current situation.

selection.num_items_selected: No items selected | 1 item selected | {n} items selected

new_version_available.body: AlekSIS® has been updated in the background. Refresh your version to keep using {instance}.

status.error: There has been an error while saving the latest changes.

generic_messages.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
generic_messages.success: The operation has been finished successfully.

errors.invalid_date: This is not a valid date.
errors.invalid_time: This is not a valid time.
errors.invalid_color: This is not a valid color.
errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.username_not_allowed: This is not an allowed username

availability_type.name: Name
availability_type.free_help_text: This indicates whether availability events with this type should count as free.
availability_type.public_help_text: This indicates whether this type should be publicly available, e. g. for creating availability events in the designated frontend.

no_selection.title: No person or group selected
no_selection.description: Select some persons or groups on the left side to show their availability events in this place

action_select.incompatible_selection_message: Action was called on incompatible selection.
